item.title: 德国新房价格因建筑业不景气而创纪录上涨
item.description: 由于住房短缺拉动了需求，5 月份德国新房价格创下历史新高，这凸显出德国总理弗里德里希-梅尔茨（Friedrich Merz）政府兑现促进住宅建设承诺的紧迫性。【原文：Prices for new homes in Germany rose to a record in May as housing shortages drive demand, underscoring the urgency facing Chancellor Friedrich Merz’s government to make good on a pledge to boost residential construction.】

item.title: 俄罗斯原油发货量反弹，罕见地向日本发货
item.description:
经批准的油轮将库页岛原油运往大洋石油公司的四国炼油厂

Sanctioned tanker carries Sakhalin crude to Taiyo Oil’s Shikoku refinery

】

item.title: 谨慎的华尔街定位为 S&P 500 指数留出反弹空间
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）和摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Analysts at firms including Barclays Plc and JPMorgan Chase & Co. see further upside for US stocks, in part because they expect institutional investors to abandon their cautious stance and ramp up exposure to equities.】

item.title: 韩国任命杨荣文为贸易部长，领导与美国的谈判
item.description: 韩国总统李在明任命经验丰富的贸易谈判专家杨汉九（Yeo Han-koo）为新任贸易部长，负责指导韩国与美国正在进行的关税谈判。【原文：South Korean President Lee Jae-myung appointed Yeo Han-koo, a seasoned trade negotiator, as the new trade minister to guide the country through ongoing tariff talks with the US.】

item.title: 纳米比亚将筹资 1.22 亿美元为 10 月到期的欧洲债券再融资
item.description: 纳米比亚财政部表示，纳米比亚计划在国内市场筹集 1.22 亿美元，为其 10 月到期的 7.5 亿美元欧元债券的一部分再融资，并将利用偿债基金清偿剩余债券。【原文：Namibia plans to raise $122 million in the domestic market to refinance a portion of its $750 million eurobond due October and will use a sinking fund to retire the balance, its Finance Ministry said.】

item.title: 从签证到喷气机，中美两国正在寻找新的贸易杠杆
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普在第二次对华贸易战中提出了许多同样的不满，但此后出现的经济战场使这次的贸易战更难避免破裂。【原文：Donald Trump brought many of the same grievances to his second trade war against China, but the economic battleground that’s emerged since then is making it harder to avoid a rupture this time around.】

item.title: 特朗普竞选美国商品期货交易委员会（CFTC）主席，向立法者兜售他在加密货币领域的职业生涯
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）选中的美国商品期货交易委员会（Commodity Futures Trading Commission）领导人布莱恩-昆廷茨（Brian Quintenz）计划告诉立法者，在国会考虑赋予衍生品监管机构更多监管数字资产的权力之际，他具有领导该机构的独特资格。【原文：Brian Quintenz, President Donald Trump’s pick to lead the US Commodity Futures Trading Commission, plans to tell lawmakers he is uniquely qualified to head the derivatives regulator as Congress considers giving it more authority over digital assets】

item.title: 英国就业数据疲软导致英镑下跌，英国央行降息预期升温
item.description: 在数据显示劳动力市场急剧恶化之后，交易商增加了对英国央行降息的押注，英镑下跌，英国债券反弹。【原文：The pound fell and UK bonds rallied as traders added to bets on interest-rate cuts from the Bank of England after data showed a sharp deterioration in the labor market.】

item.title: 花旗蒙塔古：大型科技公司推动美股牛市流向
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：US technology heavyweights have attracted a flurry of bullish bets as optimism around the economic outlook overshadows trade concerns, according to Citigroup Inc. strategists.】

item.title: 中国延长对欧洲猪肉的调查，为农场主提供缓刑措施
item.description: 中国将对欧洲猪肉的调查再延长六个月，这为面临失去一个主要市场风险的农民和生产商提供了暂时的缓和。【原文：China extended its probe into European pork for another six months, providing a temporary reprieve to farmers and producers who risk losing one of their major markets.】

item.title: 中国首次向太平洋派遣两艘航空母舰
item.description: 日本说，它首次观察到两艘中国航空母舰和支援军舰同时在太平洋上偏远的日本岛屿附近活动，这是中国海军能力不断提高的新表现。【原文：Japan said it observed two Chinese aircraft carriers and supporting warships operating simultaneously near remote Japanese islands in the Pacific Ocean for the first time, a new demonstration of Beijing’s advancing naval capabilities.】

item.title: 赞比亚经济增长飙升至 2021 年以来最高水平
item.description: 赞比亚财政部长表示，随着非洲第二大铜生产国从降雨量改善和金属产量提高中获益，赞比亚今年的经济将至少增长6%。【原文：Zambia’s economy will expand at least 6% this year as Africa’s second-largest copper producer reaps the benefit of improved rainfall and higher metal production, the finance minister said.】

item.title: 印度 Motilal 将进军私人信贷领域，引入 Modulus 负责人
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度 Motilal Oswal 金融服务公司准备进军蓬勃发展的私人信贷市场，Rakshat Kapoor 将担任该企业的负责人。【原文：India’s Motilal Oswal Financial Services is poised to enter the booming private credit market with Rakshat Kapoor set to head the venture, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国主要钢铁机构警告电动汽车价格战正在惩罚钢厂
item.description: 中国主要钢铁工业集团警告说，电动汽车价格战正在伤害钢厂，并加深其财务困境。【原文：China’s main steel industry group has warned an electric vehicle price war is hurting mills and deepening their financial woes.】

item.title: 关税担忧缓解，英国富时 100 指数突破 3 月份纪录
item.description: 由于经济前景改善和贸易紧张局势缓和，英国富时 100 指数收盘价将创下 3 月份以来的新高，挽回了因关税引发的跌势。【原文：The UK’s FTSE 100 index was set to close at a record high for the first time since March, recouping its tariff-induced slump thanks to an improving economic outlook and easing trade tensions.】

item.title: 维勒鲁瓦称欧洲央行仍可迅速调整利率
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）表示，即使在连续第八次降息使货币政策 "正常化 "之后，欧洲中央银行仍可能迅速调整利率。【原文：The European Central Bank could still move quickly to adjust interest rates even after an eighth successive cut “normalized” monetary policy, according to Governing Council member Francois Villeroy de Galhau.】

item.title: 诺和诺德在《金融时报》报道激进分子 Parvus 持股后大涨
item.description: 诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）的股价升至两个多月来的最高水平，此前有报道称激进对冲基金 Parvus Asset Management 已经增持了该公司的股份，因为这家丹麦制药商正在努力保持其在肥胖症市场的领先地位。【原文：Novo Nordisk A/S shares rose to the highest level in more than two months after a report that activist hedge fund Parvus Asset Management has built a stake as the Danish drugmaker struggles to keep its lead in the obesity market.】

item.title: 捷克杂货商推出人工智能送货平台，与 Ocado 竞争
item.description: 捷克在线杂货商 Rohlik 集团正在推出其人工智能驱动的快速杂货配送平台，其雄心勃勃的目标是在全球范围内与 Ocado Group Plc 等公司一较高下。【原文：Czech online grocer Rohlik Group is spinning out its AI-driven platform for speedy grocery deliveries with worldwide ambitions, taking on the likes of Ocado Group Plc.】

item.title: 马克-扎克伯格亲自招聘创建新的 "超级智能 "人工智能团队
item.description: 马克-扎克伯格（Mark Zuckerberg）对 Meta Platforms 公司在人工智能方面的不足感到沮丧，他正在组建一个专家团队来实现人工通用智能，该团队由人工智能研究人员和工程师组成，他们最近几周在他位于太浩湖和帕洛阿尔托的家中与他会面。【原文：Mark Zuckerberg, frustrated with Meta Platforms Inc.’s shortfalls in AI, is assembling a team of experts to achieve artificial general intelligence, recruiting from a brain trust of AI researchers and engineers who’ve met with him in recent weeks at his homes in Lake Tahoe and Palo Alto.】

item.title: 3D 持有新日铁股票，反对总裁连任
item.description: 总部位于新加坡的 3D Investment Partners 周二表示，该公司持有新日本制铁公司股票，建议股东在 6 月 24 日举行的年度股东大会上投票反对该钢铁公司总裁和副董事长的连任。【原文：Singapore-based 3D Investment Partners said Tuesday that it holds Nippon Steel Corp. stock and recommends that shareholders vote against the reappointment of the steelmaker’s president and vice chairman at its annual general meeting on June 24.】

item.title: 挪威核心通胀率降幅超过预期，创四个月新低
item.description: 挪威5月份的基本通胀率降幅略高于预期，这为挪威银行在未来几个月内开始降息提供了依据。【原文：Norway’s underlying inflation rate declined slightly more than expected in May, cementing the case for Norges Bank to begin interest-rate cuts in coming months.】

item.title: 全球投资者转而购买印度股票是看涨信号
item.description: 全球投资者有望在三个季度中首次成为印度股票的购买者，这可能是资金持续流入的一个积极指标。【原文：Global investors are on course to be purchasers of Indian equities for the first quarter in three, flashing a possible positive indicator of continued inflow.】

item.title: 里夫斯预算案公布后，英国就业率骤降，职位减少 27.6 万个
item.description: 英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）提高招聘成本后，劳动力市场恶化，英国就业人数创五年来最大降幅，工资增长放缓幅度超过预期。【原文：UK employment plunged by the most in five years and wage growth slowed more than forecast, as the labor market deteriorated after Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves ramped up the cost of hiring.】

item.title: 中国股市引领风险资产在贸易谈判前突然下挫
item.description: 在与美国进行贸易谈判的第二天之前，中国股市抹去了早些时候的涨幅，因为投资者在等待世界最大经济体之间在一些棘手问题上取得进展。【原文：Chinese stocks erased earlier gains before the second day of trade talks with the US, as investors awaited progress on some thorny issues between the world’s largest economies.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国工资增长低于预期，失业率上升
台积电 5 月份销售额因人工智能需求的恢复性增长而激增 39.6
item.description: Nvidia 公司和苹果公司的主要芯片制造商台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co., the main chipmaker for Nvidia Corp. and Apple Inc., reported a 39.6% jump in May revenue after companies stockpiled chips in response to mounting trade uncertainty.】

item.title: 高盛合伙人阿斯在工作 29 年后从高盛退休
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. partner Aaron Arth will retire from the bank after nearly three decades at the Wall Street powerhouse.】

item.title: 韩元反弹后韩国养老基金停止出售美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，韩国国家养老金管理局已经结束了为期五个月的出售美元以支撑韩元的策略。【原文：South Korea’s National Pension Service has ended a five-month strategy of selling dollars in a bid to support the won, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧洲 IPO 旱情令证券交易所争相上市
item.description: 由于选择在欧洲上市的大公司越来越少，该地区的证券交易所正加大力度争取最大的上市机会。【原文：As fewer large companies opt to go public in Europe, the region’s stock exchanges are fighting harder to win the biggest listings.】

item.title: 特朗普削减研究经费，学术出版商签署人工智能协议
item.description: 由于美国科研经费削减，学术出版商正急于与人工智能公司签订许可协议，开辟新的收入来源。【原文：Academic publishers are rushing to sign licensing deals with artificial intelligence companies, carving out a new revenue stream as US research funding cuts dim their outlook.】
